$schema.description: schema declaration is sometimes found in response.

landing.description: The landing page for the HAPI server

title.description: A short human-readable name for the server. The suggested maximum length is 40 characters.

id.description: A unique ID for the server. Ideally, this ID has the organization name in it, e.g., NASA/SPDF/SSCWeb, NASA/SPDF/CDAWeb, INTERMAGNET, UniversityIowa/VanAllen, LASP/TSI, etc.

description.description: A brief description of the type of data the server provides.

citation.description: How to cite the server. An actionable DOI is preferred (e.g., https://doi.org/...). This citation differs from the citation in an /info response. Here the citation is for the entity that maintains the data server.

contact.description: Contact information or email address for server issues. HAPI clients should show this contact information when it is certain that an error is due to a problem with the server (as opposed to the client).

contactID.description: The identifier in the discovery system for information about the contact. For example, a SPASE ID of a person identified in the contact string.
